name: Language Intelligence
tag_list: translation, localization, language-learning, interpreting, internationalization, globalization
overview:
Professional Language Solutions for Global Business

Language Intelligence provides language solutions including: translation & localization, language & culture training and interpreting to companies that are serving international customers.

Translation & Localization

The translation & localization services are focused on translating marketing collateral, technical documentation and software into 70+ languages. Localization involves translating these different forms of content in a way that makes it appear as if it was originally created by a native speaker of the language. Our focus is on the entire content creation life cycle and we also offer consulting in the areas of authoring, single-sourcing, XML and internationalization best practices. Our goal is to help our clients intelligently reduce the cost and time required to translate & localize their content which will in turn allow them to do more with the same budget and focus attention on expanding their international markets.

Language & Culture Training

Language Intelligence offers a suite of language learning programs that range from a fully online e-learning experience to a direct in the classroom approach that puts you face-to-face with a language trainer. Whether you are being sent overseas for an assignment, or you are trying to better understand, and sell, to your international customers, Language Intelligence can design a program tailored to meet your specific objectives.

Interpreting

Language Intelligence provides interpreters for situations that require face-to-face contact with speakers of different languages. Through our global network we can provide interpreters for any setting in any location. The next time you have a sales meeting with customers that donâ€™t speak your language call us to learn about options for having an interpreter present in the meeting.

Contact Us Today

Whether your company is just beginning to develop a strategy for targeting international markets, or you are interested in expanding your current presence, contact Language Intelligence today to find out how we can help you expand your international customer base.

Language Intelligence follows an ISO 9001:2008 certified quality management process.
